post_text: ASD commemorated the 19th Anniversay of 9/11 with testimonials and a special array of red, white, and blue to show the respect and honor we have for the first responders, family members who lost a love one and all our fellow Americans who lended a helping hand during that horrific time in our history.

post_text:
Good Afternoon!

Tickets for all ASD football and basketball games will be purchased and redeemed on the GoFan app. Tickets will be VALIDATED by school personnel the day of the game upon entrance into event. PLEASE DO NOT VALIDATE YOUR OWN TICKETS PRIOR TO THE GAME.

If multiple tickets are purchased on one device, all must enter the game at the same time OR transferred to that person via email (see directions in GoFan). Tickets may NOT be screenshot and sent to other people. Ticket validation can not be done with screenshots and you will not be allowed to enter the game. Please remember there are only 550 tickets available for the home team.

Friday is a BLACKOUT!!! Asking all fans to wear BLACK!!!

Should you have any questions, please contact Sherell Drake, The Athletic Director @ 662-369-8933 or sdrake@asdms.us

üíôWith Bulldog Prideüíô

Aberdeen Parent Center
October 16, 2018 at 12:30 AM ¬∑

Last call, If you would like to participate in this years event the time is now to register. Each year the ASD puts on a community and district wide alternative trick or treating event that brings literature to life.
1. Get involved through registering you and up to four others for the event. (Must pre-register and provide packaged candy).
2. Donate candy-bring to the Parent Center
3. Come out to show your support. All are invited.
October 23, 2018 behind the ASD Resource Center
#community #engagement #literature #fun #networking

Deadline to register has been extended to Thursday, October 18th.

post_text: We are hosting a P-16 Council Meeting on Tuesday, January 23, 2018, at 5:30 pm in the Cafeteria at Belle-Shivers Middle School. Thank you for your support of Aberdeen School District, we hope to see you Tuesday evening.
text: We are hosting a P-16 Council Meeting on Tuesday, January 23, 2018, at 5:30 pm in the Cafeteria at Belle-Shivers Middle School. Thank you for your support of Aberdeen School District, we hope to see you Tuesday evening.

post_text: We will start school tomorrow at 9:15 am. This will give our buses and personnel the opportunity to drive in daylight and see any slick spots that might still exist. This would have buses beginning routes around 7:40 am. Dismissal times will stay the same, breakfast will be served in all buildings. Staff should report at 8:00 am.
text: We will start school tomorrow at 9:15 am. This will give our buses and personnel the opportunity to drive in daylight and see any slick spots that might still exist. This would have buses beginning routes around 7:40 am. Dismissal times will stay the same, breakfast will be served in all buildings. Staff should report at 8:00 am.

post_text: With declining temperatures forecasted through the night and the threat of hazardous driving conditions tomorrow, Aberdeen School District will be closed on Wednesday, January 17, 2018. We want to make the decision to close now to give our parents ample time to make arrangements. Please be safe on Wednesday. Our hope is to be back on a regular schedule on Thursday.
text: With declining temperatures forecasted through the night and the threat of hazardous driving conditions tomorrow, Aberdeen School District will be closed on Wednesday, January 17, 2018. We want to make the decision to close now to give our parents ample time to make arrangements. Please be safe on Wednesday. Our hope is to be back on a regular schedule on Thursday.

post_text: Due to the impending threat of a winter storm, including snow and decreasing temperatures in our area throughout the night and into tomorrow, Aberdeen School District will be closed on Tuesday, January 16. We are making this decision now to provide our families as much time as possible to make arrangements for tomorrow. Please stay safe in the wintery conditions. We expect to reopen our schools on Wednesday, January 17.
text: Due to the impending threat of a winter storm, including snow and decreasing temperatures in our area throughout the night and into tomorrow, Aberdeen School District will be closed on Tuesday, January 16. We are making this decision now to provide our families as much time as possible to make arrangements for tomorrow. Please stay safe in the wintery conditions. We expect to reopen our schools on Wednesday, January 17.

WCBI.COM
VIDEO: The Impacts Of Healthy Food Choices On The Classroom

WCBI News
August 30, 2017 at 5:30 PM ¬∑

ABERDEEN, Miss.(WCBI)- It's been a month now but most high school students are still settling into the classroom. The Aberdeen School District is working to make sure it's students are powering through classes with the proper fuel. Usually, during the summer months, students run the risk of stumbling across unhealthy food choices. "In the month of August you can really see a difference because they are just like, oh I just want pizza or they are use to getting McDonalds. [ 276 more words ]

https://www.wcbi.com/video-impacts-healthy-food-choices-classroom/

post_text: There will be a PTO MEETING for Aberdeen Elementary School tonight!! The meeting will be held in the Media Center at 5:30pm. Also, let's remember that the weekly Media Madness will be held tonight at Aberdeen Elementary School from 3:30 until 5:30! Thanks and we look forward to seeing you there.
text: There will be a PTO MEETING for Aberdeen Elementary School tonight!! The meeting will be held in the Media Center at 5:30pm. Also, let's remember that the weekly Media Madness will be held tonight at Aberdeen Elementary School from 3:30 until 5:30! Thanks and we look forward to seeing you there.

post_text: Ok, it's Aberdeen Band Week! Thursday Night Band Night in gymnasium, Students call time at 6:00 pm! WE WILL BEGIN AT 6:30! We have grades 6-12 and will honor our 33 Seniors! Alumni Band Friday call time is 5:00 pm. Wear pink and Be prepared for the Star Spangled Banner, Fight Song, and ESPN march down, which will be at 6:10! We are excited to see our Alumni Band this weekend. Let's come out and support our Aberdeen Bulldogs and our All Superior Marching Band!
text: Ok, it's Aberdeen Band Week! Thursday Night Band Night in gymnasium, Students call time at 6:00 pm! WE WILL BEGIN AT 6:30! We have grades 6-12 and will honor our 33 Seniors! Alumni Band Friday call time is 5:00 pm. Wear pink and Be prepared for the Star Spangled Banner, Fight Song, and ESPN march down, which will be at 6:10! We are excited to see our Alumni Band this weekend. Let's come out and support our Aberdeen Bulldogs and our All Superior Marching Band!
